sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"劝说，劝导，劝诱"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: induce, persuade, urge, convince, counsel, coax
means: induce ： 指用讲道理来使某人做某事。
persuade ： 普通用词，指通过劝说、感情交流等而使对方做劝说者所希望的事。
urge ： 语气强，指不断地热情地规劝诱导。
convince ： 指凭行动、事实或言语使他人从思想感情上信服。
counsel ： 较正式用词，指对一些较重大事情所提出的劝告。有时也用于非正式场合，但仍强调严肃的一面。
coax ： 指用好话善意或耐心劝诱、哄骗某人做某事。

sentence.Network_en: Somehow, he'd managed to persuade Kay to buy one for him.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知用了什么方法，他成功说服凯给他买了一个。

sentence.Network_en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

sentence.Network_en: Ford never desisted from trying to persuade him to return to America.
sentence.Network_cn: 福特从未停止过劝说他返回美国。

博士入学考试词汇 - 博士 ... perspire 流汗 persuade 说服,使相信 pertain 属于,适于.

list.abs: But it also hit a way to persuade people to put down their pipes ., 同样地 , 这也正好说服人们放下烟斗.
nymphetamine ... Back in the forest 回到了森林 whispers persuade 无声无息 More with lady laid 美丽的仙女.
iLight... ... back in the forest where 被劝回那个 whispers persuade 有沙沙声的森林 more sugar trails 更多撒满糖的小径.
...项产品是什么,有什么用途,何处有供应. (2) 说服的方式(To persuade) 服性目标(Persuade category) 服性目标建立品牌偏好;鼓励.
any chance i could persuade you to take another ride ., 我能说服你再搭一次吗.
i want to persuade you to change your mind ., 我想劝你改变你的想法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin persuadere, from per- 'through, to completion' + suadere 'advise'

entry.def: If you persuade someone to do something, you cause them to do it by giving them good reasons for doing it.

example.ex: My husband persuaded me to come...
We're trying to persuade manufacturers to sell them here...
example.tran: 我们正在努力劝说制造商在这里销售。

entry.def: If something persuades someone to take a particular course of action, it causes them to take that course of action because it is a good reason for doing so.

example.ex: The Conservative Party's victory in April's general election persuaded him to run for President again...
example.tran: 4月保守党在大选中获胜促使他再次竞选总统。

example.ex: It was the lack of privacy that eventually persuaded us to move after Ben was born.
example.tran: 就是因为想要清静，我们最终在本出生后搬家了。

entry.def: If you persuade someone that something is true, you say things that eventually make them believe that it is true.

example.ex: I've persuaded Mrs Tennant that it's time she retired...
example.tran: 我已经说服坦南特夫人她该退休了。

example.ex: We had managed to persuade them that it was worth working with us...
example.tran: 我们已经让他们相信与我们合作是值得的。

sentences.sentence: "His speech did not sway the voters"

means.word_mean: 2. cause somebody to adopt a certain position, belief, or course of action; twist somebody's arm;

sentences.sentence: "You can't persuade me to buy this ugly vase!"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+me走+ate表动词→走过去→渗透过去
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落

Sentence.sentence: I was so grateful, " Aarons says, " but I persuaded Pat to let me return the favour in my own way with season tickets to our little theater group.
The Supreme Court is likely to persuade the parties concerned to work out a settlement.
The head technician in the lab tried to persuade the hospital administration to replace it, but they are trying to cut costs.
Employers still need to be persuaded that older workers are worth holding on to.

sentences.en: It is easy to persuade oneself.
I shall persuade him to take the medicine.
sentences.cn: 我将说服他把药吃下去。

jushi.chinese: 她说服了她的几个朋友。
